thiefworld.agents

Class Observer

  • java.lang.Object
    • thiefworld.agents.Agent
      • thiefworld.agents.Observer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class Observer
extends Agent
    Describes an internal observer which manages the interactions with other agents and maintains the internal agent representation of the environment.
    Author:
    Kees van Gelder, Stefan Boronea
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getAverageSuccessWithinRange

        public double getAverageSuccessWithinRange(ThiefWorld world,
                                  java.lang.Class<?> taskType)
        Finds the average success of a task type (hunter/gatherer) within range, which can be used to adjust internal success value(s)
        Parameters:
        world - the ThiefWorld reference.
        Returns:
        a value of the average success rate of the specified task within range

      • getBestFoodSourceWithinRange

        public FoodSource getBestFoodSourceWithinRange(ThiefWorld world,
                                      java.lang.Class<?> foodSourceType)
        Searches for the food source with the highest quantity of food within range
        Parameters:
        world - the ThiefWorld reference.
        foodSourceType - the type of food source which you are looking for.
        Returns:
        the fullest food source or null if there is none in the agent's range.

      • getClosestFoodSourceWithinRange

        public FoodSource getClosestFoodSourceWithinRange(ThiefWorld world,
                                         java.lang.Class<?> foodSourceType)
        Check to see if there is a close by food source and if there are multiple, it will choose the closest to the current agent's position.
        Parameters:
        world - the ThiefWorld reference.
        foodSourceType - the type of food source which you are looking for.
        Returns:
        the closest food source or null if there is none in the agent's range.

        public Nest searchForNest(ThiefWorld world)
        Searches for the closest nest, no matter what the range is.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • searchForNestWithinRange

        public Nest searchForNestWithinRange(ThiefWorld world)
        Searches for a close by nest within a specified range that is owned by the agent's team.
        Parameters:
        world - the ThiefWorld reference.
        Returns:
        the closest nest within range or null if there is none.

      • searchForNestWithinRange

        public Nest searchForNestWithinRange(ThiefWorld world,
                            boolean ownNest)
        Searches for a close by nest within a specified range. The nest's owner may be specified (owned by the agent's team or by other teams).
        Parameters:
        world - the ThiefWorld reference.
        Returns:
        the closest nest within range or null if there is none.
